ne31:2.3: “Sammaditthipurekkharo”ti sammaditthiya gahitaya gahitani bhavanti pancindriyani, ayam indriyehi otarana.
ne31:3.1: Taniyeva indriyani vijja, vijjuppada avijjanirodho, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho, sankharanirodha vinnananirodho, evam sabbam, ayam paticcasamuppadena otarana.
ne31:5.2: Ye sankhara anasava no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita, ayam dhatuhi otarana.
ne31:6.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam no ca bhavangam, ayam ayatanehi otarana.
